Title: Aiding the Accord: Suffusion Camp
Description:
Ash blows from the south. 

A dark bargain has been made, $n, between the djaradin of the Zaqali and Fyrakk. Their forces are building... something.

We do not know what their goals are, but they have had no hesitation in displacing anyone and everything in their path. 

Please, $n, we need champions like you to undermine these villains and deprive them of their resources.

We await your return, $n.
ObjectivesText: Travel to a Suffusion Camp and loot a Secured Shipment. Continue your efforts in aiding the Valdrakken Accord and their allies throughout the Dragon Isles.
